review: The Graphics are really great BUT 1) constant (60+) file failures, quote from logs 'hash mismatch'  - requires constant file integrity checks with reboot to get it working.2) connectivity problems if more than 1 computer from a house-hold is trying to play the game.3) to get successful log-in can take upto 2hrs with a good ADSL2+ connectionNot for me till Till it is easily accessable loggable
